title: Top countries by pharmaceutical industry employment 2014
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of employees in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Number of employees 2301534.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Turkey where Country is 35100.0.
The difference of Number of employees between the highest and lowest Country is 2266434.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of employees for 20 number of Countrys.
The maximum Number of employees 2301534.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Turkey where Country is 35100.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of employees in the y axis.
Country China has the highest Number of employees and Turkey has the lowest Number of employees.
Country India has the second highest value for Number of employees.
The Number of employees of Country Turkey is 65.57% smaller than the maximum value at China.
The Country China has the highest Number of employees, followed by India, and United States. Down to the Country Turkey which is the lowest.
The Country Turkey has 11.21 times less Number of employees than average.
